title: Laos Five-Star Luxury in Elegant Vientiane with Glittering Infinity Pool
description: Experience the perfect combination of traditional culture and cosmopolitan living with a charming stay at Crowne Plaza Vientiane, an IHG Hotel. Experience the wonders of Laos' largest city, dotted with gleaming Buddhist temples, elegant malls and prestigious golf courses. When you're not exploring, unwind in the infinity edge outdoor pool or at the tranquil spa, and savour the local cuisine at the onsite restaurants.

title: Laos Vientiane City Break near Night Market & Mekong Riverfront Promenade with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description:
Perfectly positioned in the heart of Laos' capital, Vientiane, this central stay places you just moments from tranquil Nam Phou Park and the atmospheric French Quarter, where tree-lined boulevards meet colonial architecture. Stroll to the revered Wat Si Saket temple or explore the vibrant Vientiane Night Market, brimming with local handicrafts, textiles and street food.

Savour authentic Laotian cuisine at onsite Oopen Restaurant and toast to your stay with a drink at the Lobby Bar. After exploring the Mekong riverside promenade at sunset, return to contemporary comforts and city views from your elegantly appointed room.
offer_address: Nam Phu Square, Setthathirath Road, Ban Xieng, Ngeun Chanthabury District, Vientiane 01000, Laos
